name: Game Design And Other Things
description: You have been hired to do some Game Design, maybe other things as well! Use various software tools, such as GAMEDESIGN.exe, VIDEOUPLOAD.exe, EDITVIDEO.exe, CHAT.exe and SOCIALMEDIA.exe to work your 9 to 5 job! Things won't always go well and you might lose Motivation, but don't worry, you're still doing plenty of good around you!
